name: PreflightRuleFlag
shortdesc: The flag indicating whether the rule is disabled, set for error, warning, or just informational.

property.name: RETURN_AS_ERROR
property.shortdesc: Treat as error if rule check failed.

property.name: RETURN_AS_WARNING
property.shortdesc: Treat as warning if rule check failed.

property.name: RETURN_AS_INFORMATIONAL
property.shortdesc: Treat as information only if rule check failed.
